name: com.unity.xr.visionos
description:
Provides support for Apple visionOS XR features. This includes build post-processing code and the following subsystem implementations:
  - XRSessionSubsystem
  - XRDisplaySubsystem
  - XRInputSubsystem
  - XRMeshSubsystem
  - XRPlaneSubsystem
  - XRImageTrackingSubsystem
  - XRAnchorSubsystem
  - XRHandSubsystem
